abstract: Justo Wilmar Villar Viveros (born 30 June 1977) is a Paraguayan professional footballer who plays for Colo-Colo in the Chilean Primera División, as a goalkeeper.A Paraguayan international on more than 100 occasions, he represented the nation in three World Cups and five Copa América tournaments.
